requestParams.name: refund_id
requestParams.desc: 退款ID，退款查询接口可查询到，如https://open.youzan.com/v3/apicenter/doc-api-main/1/2/trade_advanced/youzan.trade.refund.search

requestParams.name: version
requestParams.desc: 退款版本号，退款查询接口可查询到，如https://open.youzan.com/v3/apicenter/doc-api-main/1/2/trade_advanced/youzan.trade.refund.get

requestDemos.code:
'201806201524210000010610', 'version' => '1529479461152', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['refund_id']="201806201524210000010610"
params['version']=1529479461152

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.trade.refund.agree', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

errorCodes.errorDesc: 退款操作请求太快了，请慢点～
操作过期, 请刷新后确认最新退款状态
errorCodes.solution: 退款状态在操作前已经变更，需要重新确认状态
